---
title: "Weight analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(skimr)
```

```{r}
# Read in clean BMI data
# Looking at data over last 10 years so filter out anything pre 2009
bmi_clinical <- read_csv(here("data_clean/bmi_clinical.csv")) %>% 
  filter(year > "2008")
```


```{r}
skim(bmi_clinical)
```



```{r}
# Initial plots of data 
bmi_clinical %>% 
  filter(gender == "All") %>% 
  filter(weight_category == "Clinical - Overweight, Obese & Severely Obese") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year,
      y = value,
      colour = hb_name) +
  geom_point()
```
